nodes.text: Tan Leader was a callsign of a Rebel Alliance X-wing pilot. One individual who served as Tan Leader assisted Sana Starros with the evacuation of Tiferep Major while Accresker Jail was held back from colliding with it by a tractor beam. Darth Vader spotted the squadron from the jail's surface and threw his lightsaber at Tan Leader's starfighter, slicing through its cockpit and killing the pilot.
